settings.text:
Have a question or comment? Don't be shy: Reach out and say hi!
Support hours: Monday-Friday, 7am-3pm

settings.heading: What is PSA grading?
settings.content: PSA (Professional Sports Authenticator) grading is the industry standard for card condition. A PSA 9-10 grade indicates near-mint to mint condition with minimal to no visible flaws. We guarantee all our cards meet PSA 9-10 equivalent standards.

settings.heading: How long does shipping take?
settings.content: Orders typically take 2-3 weeks for delivery. We source cards directly from Japan and ship from our UK warehouse with tracked shipping. International orders may take additional time for customs processing.

settings.heading: Are your cards authentic?
settings.content: Yes, all our cards are 100% authentic. We source directly from trusted partners in Japan and verify every card using advanced detection methods and expert inspection before shipping.

settings.heading: What is your return policy?
settings.content: We offer hassle-free returns within 30 days if you're not satisfied. Cards must be returned in the same condition as received. Contact us for return instructions.

settings.heading: How does membership work?
settings.content: Our membership program offers up to 12% cashback on every purchase, priority access to new releases, and entry to exclusive mystery pack raffles. Visit our Membership page to learn more and sign up.

settings.heading: Can I trade in my cards?
settings.content: Yes! We offer a trade-in program where you can exchange your cards for store credit or cash. We offer competitive rates for quality cards. Visit our Trade-In page to get started.

settings.text: We're here to help! Reach out to our team and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
